source.query: select cp.*, icd10.name_english from dt4h.condition_profile cp left join standard_dict.icd_10 icd10 on cp.code = icd10.code

ecg.query:
SELECT ecg.id, e.id_patient, e.id as encounter_id, exec_date, sample_freq, num_qrs, pr_duration, qrs_duration, qt, qtc, qtb, qtf, p_axis, qrs_axis, t_axis, inter_text, aVF, aVL, aVR, I, II, III, V1, V2, V3, V4, V5, V6 
FROM ecg.ecg ecg INNER JOIN (
	SELECT id_ecg, raw_data[1] AS aVF, raw_data[2] AS aVL, raw_data[3] AS aVR, raw_data[4] AS I, raw_data[5] AS II, raw_data[6] AS III, raw_data[7] AS V1, raw_data[8] AS V2, raw_data[9] AS V3, raw_data[10] AS V4, raw_data[11] AS V5, raw_data[12] AS V6 
	from (select id_ecg, array_agg(c_data order by c_name) AS raw_data from ecg.mortara_typical_data mcd group by id_ecg) AS mcd_agg
) AS mcd ON ecg.id = mcd.id_ecg 
INNER JOIN patient.observation o ON ecg.id_observation = o.id 
INNER JOIN patient.encounter e ON e.id = o.id_encounter
INNER JOIN (SELECT id_ecg, string_agg(nullif(inter_text, ''), ' || ') AS inter_text FROM ecg.mortara_interpret GROUP BY id_ecg) AS mi ON ecg.id = mi.id_ecg

echoObservation.query:
select th.*, e.id as id_encounter, e.id_patient  
from heart_echo.tte_header th,
patient.observation po,
patient.encounter e 
where th.id_observation = po.id and
po.id_encounter = e.id

echoMeasurements.query:
select 
	echodata.*,
	dict.code,
	dict.shortcut,
	dict.descr,
	dict.unit
from heart_echo.tte_data echodata
left join heart_echo.dt4h_dict dict
on echodata.id_dict = dict.id

source.query: select encounter.*, icd10.name_english from dt4h.encounter_profile encounter LEFT JOIN standard_dict.icd_10 icd10 ON encounter.reason_code = icd10.code

SELECT e.id_patient AS subject, lc.code_loinc AS code, o.id_encounter AS encounter, l.exec_date AS effective_date, ld.value, ld.unit FROM patient.lab l  JOIN lab.lab_data ld ON l.id = ld.id_lab  JOIN patient.observation o ON l.id_observation = o.id  JOIN lab.lab_code lc ON ld.id_lab_code = lc.id  JOIN patient.encounter e ON o.id_encounter = e.id  JOIN dt4h.lab_result lr ON lc.code_loinc::text = lr.lonic_code::text
select mp.*, atc.name_en from dt4h.medication_profile mp left join standard_dict.atc atc on mp.code_atc = atc.code
